attributes.action: Remove Angela Eagles as Wallasey MP
attributes.additional_details:
I ask the good people of Wallasey to vote to remove Anglea Eagles as the MP.

Angela Eagle was not Born in Wallasey
Angela Eagle is hardly ever in Wallasey
Angela Eagle does not Care about Wallasey
Angela Eagle is Using Wallasey as a platform for her own personal gains
Angela Eagle has not improved Wallasey since she became MP
Angela Eagle has ran Wallasey into the Ground
Angela Eagle does not fight for our Cause
Angela Eagle does not deserve to be Wallasey MP
Angela Eagle has let Wallasey down for over 20 years now, Maybe the fact that she is not from Wallasey and does not contain Wallasey blood within her to care enough about the area like a Wallasey person does. Like it or disagree, It made a huge impact on Wallasey and we have slowly become an area no longer of natural beauty and there is two people at fault for allowing it to happen "WBC" and more importantly our own MP representative Angela Eagle.
